NoA.K.B. Constitution as amended February 15> 1939
(c) Active members may vote by proxy, provided there is not a
quorum present. It shall be the duty of the Executive Committee to
allot the number of proxies to the respective districts in such a manner
as to constitute a quorum.
ARTICLE VI
By-laws:
The by-laws of this association may be adopted and amended by a
majority vote of the Executive Committee.
ARTICLE VII
Amendments:
This constitution may be amended by a two-third vote of the active
membership. Notice of any proposed amendment shall be submitted to the
membership at least thirty days prior to the date of voting.
